artofillusion.boundingsphere

Class BoundingSphere

  • java.lang.Object
    • artofillusion.boundingsphere.BoundingSphere

  • public class BoundingSphere
extends java.lang.Object
    BoundingSphere is an enclosing volume to a set of points in 3D-space. A BoundingSphere may be defined by a variety of different tools and it has some simple methods for detecting interaction with other BoundingSpheres.
    Version:
    0.02, May-04-2019, for Art of Illusion
    Author:
    Petri Ihalainen, (peteihis)

    • Constructor Detail

      • BoundingSphere

        public BoundingSphere()
        Define an empty BoundingSphere

      • BoundingSphere

        public BoundingSphere(Vec3 center,
                      double radius)
        Create a predefined BoundingSphere
        Parameters:
        center - The centerpoint of the sphere as Vec3
        radius - The radius of the sphere.

      • BoundingSphere

        public BoundingSphere(Vec3 center,
                      double radius,
                      int fit)
        Define a BoundingSphere
        Parameters:
        center - The centerpoint of the sphere as Vec3
        radius - The radius of the sphere.
        fit - One of UNKNOWN, EXACT, NON_MINIMAL, APPROXIMATE

      • BoundingSphere

        public BoundingSphere(Vec3 center,
                      double radius,
                      int fit,
                      int infoID)
        Define a BoundingSphere
        Parameters:
        center - The centerpoint of the sphere as Vec3
        radius - The radius of the sphere.
        fit - One of UNKNOWN, EXACT, NON_MINIMAL, APPROXIMATE
        infoID - Optional. The ID-number of the objectinfo, the sphere was created for.

    • Method Detail

      • collides

        public boolean collides(BoundingSphere sphere)
        Check if another BoundingSphere is partially or entirely inside this BoundingSphere. Surface-to-surface distance 0.0 is not considered a collision.

      • contacts

        public boolean contacts(BoundingSphere sphere,
                        double tolerance)
        Check if the surface of another BoundingSphere is just touching the surface of this BoundingSphere.

      • contains

        public boolean contains(BoundingSphere sphere)
        Check another BoundingSphere is entirely inside this BoundingSphere. Surfaces may still be in contact.

      • direction

        public Vec3 direction(BoundingSphere sphere)
        The direction in which direction the other BoundingSphere is.

      • distance

        public double distance(BoundingSphere sphere)
        Minimum distance between the surface of this BoundingSphere and the surface of the other. A negative value is reported in case of collision.

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Get a verbal description of the BoundingSphere
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
